Package io.permazen.index

Interface Index3<V1,V2,V3,T>

Type Parameters:
V1 - first indexed value type
V2 - second indexed value type
V3 - third indexed value type
T - index target type
All Superinterfaces:
Index<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
CoreIndex3
public interface Index3<V1,V2,V3,T> extends Index<T>
An index on three fields.

Indexes are read-only and "live", always reflecting the current transaction state.

See Also:
  • io.permazen.index

    Index1<V1,V2>
